duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage feasibility study involving an external vendor and multiple internal customers to integrate scientific data from internal and external sources.
Interface with stakeholders to ensure requirements are agreed and documented.
Develop, maintain, and communicate the project plan, reviewing and challenging the status of the project.
Prepare and communicate status reports to stakeholder groups, maintain a risk log, and assess project issues.

education_certification.credential: University degree required, PMP certification preferred
